basic_information.scholarship_name: Samuel Henry Mitchell and Elizabeth P. Mitchell Endowed Scholarship for Chemistry

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science majoring in Chemistry. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Chemistry major 3.0 GPA or above Undergraduate student Enrolled in minimum of 6 hours per semester Two faculty recommendation letters

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
